titleStmt.title: The humble address of the House of Commons to the King
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Re-printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, printer to the Kings most Excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Thanking him for his speech and pledging support.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
